newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri Lanka stocks seen firm on buying interest.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka stocks seen firm on buying interest.

text.p: Sri Lankan stocks were seen trading firmer on Monday despite the government's decision to delay the sale of its holding in two state plantation firms, brokers said.

"Overall, things are looking up after a couple of slow weeks," said Ajit Dias Wanigasekera of Ceylinco Stockbrokers. "There is buying interest, foreigners mainly on blue chips and retailers on lower-end counters."
But sellers, anticipating an upward momentum, were not willing to part with their holdings, Wanigasekera said.
